page.title: 15Housing-cont'd
page.content: One of the problems of building new houses in our area is that local people are not always very happy about where these homes are built.Recently there has been a great fuss over made over the development of a piece of land behind my house.The grass has been cut and the trees chopped down.All the houses in our road have lost half of their back gardens so we haven't got much garden left.People feel very angry about this.the local newspaper has been up to interview people living in the road and take photographs and Southern Television has sent a camera crew to fil report for the news programme Coast to Coast.People think that too many houses are going to be crammed into the field and that will spoil things for everyone else.Local children are also ngry because they have lost a good place to play.
